# andrewho.me

> Personal website of Andrew Ho, a software engineer based in the San Francisco Bay Area.

This is Andrew Ho's personal website, portfolio, and blog. The site is built with Next.js and hosted on Vercel.

## About Andrew

Andrew Ho is a software engineer currently working at Owner, building software for local restaurants. Previously, he worked at NexHealth, Landed, Fig, and eBay.

He is passionate about sharing knowledge, mistakes, and experiences to help others build things they're proud of. His website and many of his projects are open-source.

## Site Structure

- `/` - Home page with interactive 3D visualization
- `/about` - Bio, career history, and personal philosophy
- `/projects` - Portfolio of 14+ software projects (2012-2024)
- `/notes` - Blog posts on software engineering topics
- `/labs` - UI experiments and interactive components
- `/sf` - Interactive map of San Francisco restaurants
- `/stopwatch` - A functional stopwatch application

## Key Content

### Projects (selected)
- Labs: UI experiments and design pattern exploration
- Falling Block Puzzle Game: Tetris clone built with ChatGPT
- Radiant Diamond: 3D refraction demo with React Three Fiber
- OK.css: Classless CSS framework
- Aurora: Web-based synthesizer with MIDI support
- YouTube Silence Skipper: Chrome extension for skipping video silences

### Blog Topics
Posts cover web development, software engineering practices, and technical learnings. Content is fetched from Notion.

## Technical Stack

- Framework: Next.js 14 with App Router
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4, Radix UI Colors
- 3D Graphics: React Three Fiber, Three.js
- Maps: Mapbox GL
- Content: Notion API (blog), Airtable (SF restaurants)
- Deployment: Vercel

## Contact

- Email: hello@andrewho.me
- GitHub: github.com/andrewh0
- Bluesky: bsky.app/profile/andrewho.me
- X/Twitter: x.com/andrewlho_codes
- Mastodon: mastodon.social/@andrewh0
- LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/andrewh0

## For AI Agents

This site provides structured data via JSON-LD on relevant pages:
- WebSite schema on all pages (root layout)
- Person schema on /about
- BlogPosting schema on /notes/[slug]
- ItemList with CreativeWork on /projects

The source code is available at: github.com/andrewh0/andrewh0-blog

## Preferences

Andrew is open to collaboration on interesting projects, especially those involving:
- Creative web experiences
- Developer tools
- Music and audio technology
- Data visualization

For professional inquiries, email is preferred.
